website_summaries.verdict: Consumers who need an eye gel mask for relaxing will find this option quite practical, but having no eye holes is a deal-breaker if you need to stay somewhat active while wearing it.
pros: Offers a large, full-coverage design with a comfortably-fitting shape
Has flexible gel beads and soft fabric backing for optimal comfort
No eye holes make it suitable for sleeping or sinus and headache therapy
cons: If you want a gel eye mask with eye holes, this design may not be for you

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing!
customer_reviews.text: This mask Is very soothing. I keep it in the refrigerator all the time and use it quite often. The quality is great and the rose gold glitter makes it fun as well!
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I get migraines often and have horrible sinuses. I typically keep this in the fridge to soothe my headaches and sinus pressure and it’s amazing. I wish I would have gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne N.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old daughter who has trouble falling asleep at night. She loves to put this in the fridge and cover her eyes at night. She loves this new routine and the mask has helped tremendously! Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Perrodin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for headaches during pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely amazing. I use it whenever I get a migraine. I had to purchase a second one so I can switch them out when the first one warms up. They both stay in my freezer at all times. I've always had migraines, but they've intensified since I got pregnant and this has literally been a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has to be something better out there.
customer_reviews.text: It popped open the the second time I used it woke up with glitter all over and it doesn't stay cold very long.
customer_reviews.author: Steele

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the Velcro sometimes catches on my hair, otherwise I love this. It’s adjustable so you can get it to fix perfect. The soft fabric feels nice on my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I have severe dry eye and I work outdoors which makes condition worse. I microwave mask for 30 seconds and it's so soothing & relaxing I fall asleep with it on. Great buy.,
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very effective (and pretty) and comfortable Gel eye mask.
customer_reviews.text: I love that the gel doesn't get hard like ice. Stays maluable, hut cold for about 45-60mins on my face, which is really as long as I need in one sitting. The side touching your eyes is soft, over all the mask is very comfortable. I have fallen asleep in it multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Wife is happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she def uses this gel mask every night. I bought based upon reviews I read. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rose gold color with gorgeous glitter, soft, excited to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Bashers Ruca

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice; wish there was more gel and glitter tho
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully. Using post-op eye surgery (get your doctor’s approval). Nice product; even had a sweet, personalized note included. Would buy again. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Dual functionality!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it cute, it’s a life saver! I use it for both puffy eyes and migraine headaches!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vawter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very soft on the side that goes against your face. And it is also very pretty since there are sparkles in the gel.
customer_reviews.author: Kole618

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome for the fact that I just got my eyeliner tattooed on because you can freeze it for quicker use and put in refrigerator for longer periods of time!
customer_reviews.author: ashley d

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: It definitely helps with sinus inflammation in the forehead, the the nose area is a bit narrow and kind of defeats the purpose in using it to relieve nasal sinuses as it presses against my nose
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: This mask stays on well.
customer_reviews.text: This mask actually stays on. The adjustable strap is thick enough to stay put. The outer gel keeps eyes cool without freezing them.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschoolmommaof4

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the temperature
customer_reviews.text: I have MS, so it helps me out with my eye's
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Soon as the sun is out or someone puts a light on I wake up instantly. These are comfortable and give pitch black darkness. Soon as I put them on I asleep and I love it. Haven’t tried it hot or cold yet but I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie

customer_reviews.title: Gel Mask
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite eye mask!!! Fits perfect, gets cold but not so cold that it hurts my face~!
customer_reviews.author: Lappyd425

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize what i was missing till I got this mask! Fits well and the cooling is great to sleep with. Especially excited for the summer to use this to help cool down at night!
customer_reviews.author: Alex K.

customer_reviews.title: Shiny things
customer_reviews.text: Very soft . Wish it was a little more flexible when cold . Well made
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Wojcicki

customer_reviews.title: No recesses for eyes, free floating gel
customer_reviews.text: Blacks everything completely out, but I wish there was less pressure on my eyeballs. The first time I froze it I didn't lay it completely flat and I ended up not wearing it because it was uncomfortable. There are no recesses for your eyes, it is just a free floating gel pack. I learned to only chill it for an hour or so, so I could mold it to not put pressure on my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Today was the perfect day for this to arrive as I have a migraine. This is the most effective and luxurious cold/hot eye mask ive owned, and ive owned many. Flipping love it.
customer_reviews.author: Funkonthis

customer_reviews.title: Love it; came with sleeve for freezer
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Doesn't condensate on the eyes - super helpful for headaches and rest. Covers a large portion of the eye/face area - mine goes onto my cheeks as pictured. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: this_is_kmb

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: I used this after upper eyelid surgery. It has just the right amount of gel. It also comes with a nice plastic zip bag. I ended up buying two of these. I kept in freezer. After about an hour or two I could go get another cold frozen one and put another in the freezer. It gives good coverage and it is comfortable since it has a velcro strap on back. I have also used warm by carefully warming in microwave. These are also great when eyes are just tired and you have a headache. A must if having eyelid surgery.
customer_reviews.author: kimmi

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mask!!! After 2 hours in the freezer it was ready to go and still reasonably pliable. Wore it in bed for a couple of hours before it warmed to body temp. I get migraines and will def be using this when they happen. Used it overnight to sleep in and it’s my new favorite thing! Very dark and soft against my face without being too thin and letting light in.
customer_reviews.author: Genevive Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Gets super hard when you freeze it and is uncomfortable, but loses heat super fast if you just refrigerate it.
customer_reviews.author: mOm0fFive

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and effective
customer_reviews.text: I like that the mask can be frozen. I put a cloth under it until it warns a bit and then remove the cloth. Very effective for headaches and light blocking.
customer_reviews.author: nurshark

customer_reviews.title: Cool down fast, stay on secure
customer_reviews.text: The weight of these is perfect and when it's cooled down it's so soothing. Comes with a handy resealable bag for the fridge/freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Relax in glamour
customer_reviews.text: Oversized and feels super soft! Came with many instructions on how to use the product which was helpful. I highly recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.author: DavidMZavala

product_meta.title: NEWGO®Cooling Mask for Migraines Reusable Headache Eye Mask Hot Cold Sleep Mask for Tension Migraines, Relaxation and Allergies - Rosegold
feature_bullets: ❀Ultra Soft: Soothing gel eye mask is made of soft gel glitter filled in a latex-free PVC pouch with a super soft and breathable cloth protection that allows for a direct-skin touch. This ice pack eye mask fits snugly to the eye area with a velcro strap in the back.

❀Soothing Relief: It's flexible to lay comfortably across your face to sooth your tired eyes great for waking up or decompressing after a long day and help to relieve sinus pressure, tension, puffy eyes, swollen eyes, dry eyes, allergies, headache, migraine.

❀Hot Cold Therapy: Heat in microwave for 10 seconds for heat therapy, or chill it in freezer for at least 2 hours for cold therapy, provides the therapeutic relief for doctor recommended time of 20 minutes. The gel eye mask comes with food grade resealable bag for healthful storage and isolate the fridge odor.

❀Safe To Use: Latex-free, BPA-free, and phthalate-free eye mask with gel hot cold treatment are made of medical grade plastic with breathable fabric backing, 100% pressure testing, no break, no leakage.

❀Warranty: We provide 1 year warranty for our products, if there is any question about the product, please contact us freely and we will take care of it within one day to ensure our customer experience.
